name: Roll Dice for 35
description:
A new brainstorming puzzle based on roll of the dice mechanic.

Created for GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Credits:

Design, code - Vitalii Chardymov

3D model - "Dice d6 game ready PBR" asset by @lerrmar

Icon art - Vecteezy asset by jemastock

Sound - "Ultimate Sound FX Bundle" asset by Sidearm Studios

Music - "Total Music Collection" asset by Muz Station Productions

Inspiration - "GMTK" channel by Mark Brown
